page.shortlink: api sql namespace table snapshot class load dbf method
page.prototype: L LoadDBF(TableName as C [,EventScript as C] )
page.description: Load definitions and data from a table in the currently open workspace.
page.discussion: Returns true if the definitions and data were loaded successfully and false if an error occurred.

argument.name: TableName
argument.description: The name of the table to load.

argument.name: EventScript
argument.description: Optional. A string that contains an Xbasic event script that is executed when an event is triggered during the operation. See [DatabaseSnapshot Events] for additional information.
